Message:
She climbed inside,
and in that instant...

I felt shards of wood and
sparks graze my cheeks.

Immediately, I thrusted
my arms into the flames.

I have to save the
kind-hearted girl who
believed in me...!”

their heat preventing me
from getting any closer
to the wreckage.

If I am to be cursed with this
fate of death, then take me instead.

I’ll die as many times as it takes!
So please, spare her...!”

The flames were hot enough
to burn my arms off...
but that was nothing
compared to the ice
freezing my heart...

I held what was left of
her in my arms.
It felt as if a part of me...
